meanings.sent1: The playground bully was known as a niderings.
meanings.sent2: The town was full of niderings who would never stand up for what is right.
meanings.sent3: The niderings in the story always tried to cheat their way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The villain in the movie was a true niderings, always betraying others for his own gain.
meanings.sent5: The niderings in the fairy tale were always defeated by the brave heroes.

meanings.definition: To act in a cowardly or despicable manner.
meanings.sent1: He niderings when faced with a difficult decision.
meanings.sent2: She always niderings when it comes to taking responsibility for her actions.
meanings.sent3: The cat niderings when it sees a mouse, running away in fear.
meanings.sent4: The politician niderings by spreading lies about his opponent.
meanings.sent5: The soldier refused to niderings and bravely faced the enemy.
